subtitleNullable: A dataset containing synthetic images of insects within varying backgrounds
descriptionNullable:
## Overview

The dataset was programatically generated through Python and each foreground was edited through GIMP, a photo editing software. Images for the foreground (insects) and the background were all taken from pexels.com, unsplash.com, and, pixabay.com; website that offers free vector images without necessary attribution. The dataset in the folder `Insect Classes` contains 1000 synthetic images for each insect class. You may choose to adjust this as preferred. For the test data, you may use your own photos or videos. On the other hand, the dataset in the `ImageClassesCombinedWithCOCOAnnotations` Folder contains merged versions of the classes together with the COCO Annotations and the test images.

## Similar dataset
* [Sea Animals Image Dataset🌊](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/vencerlanz09/sea-animals-image-dataste)


### Current available insect classes
* Bees
* Beetles
* Butterflies
* Cicada
* Dragonflies
* Grasshoppers
* Moths
* Scorpions
* Snails
* Spiders


## Update
As per version 5 of the dataset, I've added the Insect Classes directory which contains 1000 synthetic images of ten insect classes. There is also a notebook attached with training a CNN using transfer learning.
title: Insect Village Synthetic Dataset
subtitle: A dataset containing synthetic images of insects within varying backgrounds
description:
## Overview

The dataset was programatically generated through Python and each foreground was edited through GIMP, a photo editing software. Images for the foreground (insects) and the background were all taken from pexels.com, unsplash.com, and, pixabay.com; website that offers free vector images without necessary attribution. The dataset in the folder `Insect Classes` contains 1000 synthetic images for each insect class. You may choose to adjust this as preferred. For the test data, you may use your own photos or videos. On the other hand, the dataset in the `ImageClassesCombinedWithCOCOAnnotations` Folder contains merged versions of the classes together with the COCO Annotations and the test images.

## Similar dataset
* [Sea Animals Image Dataset🌊](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/vencerlanz09/sea-animals-image-dataste)


### Current available insect classes
* Bees
* Beetles
* Butterflies
* Cicada
* Dragonflies
* Grasshoppers
* Moths
* Scorpions
* Snails
* Spiders


## Update
As per version 5 of the dataset, I've added the Insect Classes directory which contains 1000 synthetic images of ten insect classes. There is also a notebook attached with training a CNN using transfer learning.
